definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们并不认同那些片面夸大反向收购作用的作法。

sentences.english: Although issuer gets right gold, need to assume the market to turn over aweather danger however.
sentences.chinese: 发行者虽然收到权利金，却需要承担市场反向风险。

sentences.english: Try making multiple blogs and 'sso have them most link to one main site.
sentences.chinese: 可尝试群建博客并充分诳骗其反向链接。

sentences.english: Backlink pages must relate to our concept.
sentences.chinese: 反向链接的网页必须与我们的概念。

sentences.english: Some electronic load has an extra function of supply countercurrent.
sentences.chinese: 有些电子负载还具有反向充电的特殊作用。

sentences.english: The 56-year-old hedge-fund manager has played the contrarian before.
sentences.chinese: 56岁的鲍尔森以前一直玩儿的是反向操作。

sentences.english: Black boxes make it tough to reverse-engineer the equipment.
sentences.chinese: “黑盒子”手法使得中方难以对设备进行反向开发。

sentences.english: The trend of the P shear with opposite shear sense may constrain the development of the antithetic eccs.
sentences.chinese: 方向的同向剪切趋势抑制反向褶劈理的形成。

sentences.english: The transmission also contains a set of gears that can reverse the direction of the wheels.
sentences.chinese: 变速器还有一套使得车轮反向运动的齿轮。

sentences.english: Sometimes, backronyms come from outdated language.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，反向缩略语来自于旧式语言。

sentences.english: Flux reversal machine (FRM) is a special doubly salient permanent magnet machine.
sentences.chinese: 磁通反向电机是一种特殊的双凸极永磁电机。

sentences.english: In tunnels, a lashing backhand fills the cab with soot.
sentences.chinese: 过隧道时，反向风把煤灰灌进驾驶室。

sentences.english: In movies and on TV, wheels appear to rotate in reverse.
sentences.chinese: 在电影和电视中，轮子看起来似乎是反向转动的。

sentences.english: If the reverse is wrong, stop is forward.
sentences.chinese: 翩如果反向错了，那么停下来也是前进。

sentences.english: Jones matrix based step-down iteration synthesis procedure for filter of this kind is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于琼斯矩阵的反向递推设计方法。

definition: (physics) inertia/(fig.) force of habit/tendency to do things in the accustomed way/habitual
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
